website_summaries.verdict: The Spikeball set for serious players.
pros: Stands out for its overall sturdier build and two higher quality balls for extra spin
Kit includes a ball pump, carrying bag, and serving marker
cons: The ball pump is of low quality, and the reinforced rim and legs are breakable if fallen on

customer_reviews.title: Great game (only buy pro model)
customer_reviews.text: This game is so fun and easy to learn but difficult to master! Our family plays most evenings after dinner and the kids play regularly against each other (11 and 15). Warning- We originally bought the regular version but it broke after a week from the rubber spike ball hitting the perimeter ring. The pro has reinforced ring and no problems so far 2+ months of heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great game, worth your time and money.
customer_reviews.text: I love the pro set vs the standard... It's so much better for good game play and strength as a whole. The difference in the ball alone makes a difference. And the bag and pump and such are an added plus.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Miller

customer_reviews.title: Skip the basic setup and go pro!
customer_reviews.text: I love Spikeball!!! I've had the basic kit for a couple years and wanted something a little more sturdy and solid feeling. This does the trick! I love that it has additional slip free rubber on the legs. I also really like the fact that the time is thicker and not as easy to move when hit hard. Another feature I really like that I wasn't aware was a bonus is the fact that the rim on the pro set is yellow. This makes it stand out much more than the traditional black rim and is much easier to see during game play.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Blake

customer_reviews.title: If you have an unhealthy relationship with having fun, be careful because this game will take over your life.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most fun games I've ever played. Setup is a breeze and with just 3 friends you're having an absolute blast. I am addicted to this game and every time I'm sitting at my desk at work (like right now) I'm thinking about how badly I want to play. The only downside to this game is that my social circle isn't as addicted as I am and I wish I could just clone myself 3 times to always have people to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first set, so I do not know much about it beside it seems quite solid. Everything seems meet expectation and on demo video except the packaging box came in with. The package box came in as BLACK, nothing like video or picture at all. YET, everything inside seem authentic. I have used it 2 times so far at beach and have not taken it apart since assembled. So I would say the product seems solid and meet my expectation at this time.
customer_reviews.author: mom_of_2

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: We saw people playing on the beach so I purchased this for my husband‘s birthday present. It’s a fun little game and the kids are into it also. Easy for the whole family. I have not packed it up and taken it anywhere but it comes in a travel bag and it would be very simple. I’ve just left it up in my backyard. I don’t know that the tournament version was necessary since it’s our first playing. I think the less expensive version would’ve been just fine but either way it was a gift and my husband is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tangled mess

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Years ago we bought the Slammo set - excellent purchase BTW - and it hooked us on this game. We decided to purchase the Pro edition for the warranty and for the overall better quality set. It does not disappoint. When we had an issue with one of the balls, we emailed Spikeball for a replacement. They sent two! free of charge. The Pro edition balls are better and the frame with the rubber feet is way better. Buy Slammo to see if you like, buy Spikeball Pro once you are hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, doesn't work to well
customer_reviews.text: I love volleyball so this is a pretty cool concept. But what I found was that unless you hit in the middle of the net AND with a good amount of force, the bounce is totally unpredictable. Not a family game with younger kids. We had a bunch of pretty athletic 10yo's play and it was a disaster. If you're within 6 inches of the rim, the bounce is very erratic. The pro balls were also pretty lopsided after pumping them up. Big disappointment. Should have just bought the cheap $50 version but guessing it would be lower quality.
customer_reviews.author: JuanSeriousAmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Fun with family and friends
customer_reviews.text: The item was shipped in another box to prevent damage to original box. Always nice to have extra protection when it's a gift. All items in the box were included in the description. We like how strong the platform is and the netting. Can tell they have put in a lot of work designing it. Not cheaply built! The bag was strong and was able to actually hold the items after taking it apart. It is very easy to take apart and put back together.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Higher quality than a regular net.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely an upgrade from the normal spikeball nets. I had a friend who brought one once and we used it instead of the normal nets. I almost immediately bought my own after getting home. It is definitely a better quality net as well. I would highly recommend to anyone who gets into it or likes to okay competitively.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Reconsidering purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if Amazon or Mfg...I paid the extra money for the "better" model. Here is what is on my door step.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Same money and time - don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Could this be made any cheaper? No. Did they replace the first one with a 2nd one? Yes. Was the 2nd one just as cheap as the first and break just as fast? Oh yeah... Save your money and time and skip this product.
customer_reviews.author: Muldoonb

customer_reviews.title: Great game for the entire family!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game. The frame is pretty easy to set up. The harder part is adjusting the tension in the net. You’ll get better each time. You’ll have to tighten the net every once in awhile bc the net loosens a bit as you play. Our family loves it. My kids loves Spikeball. :)
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Pump is broken upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the pro model to have a pump. The pump was broken on delivery. The rubber squeeze piece has a small tear. Frustrating and disappointed as this was a graduation gift. There is no way to contact the seller to get a replacement pump and no way to order just the pump. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: BankerJohn

customer_reviews.title: Poor strength of the net (which is key to product)
customer_reviews.text: I received my (new) spikeball pro set in the mail and immediately set it up to make sure it was ready for SPIKE. The first time putting the net on it began to tear. One of the squares of the net tore completely as I was wrapping it over the bar. My past experience with my normal spikeball set is a surprising strength to the net. I have assembled that set numerous times and applied a lot of tension to the net in order to make it taught and it has never ripped. That was not the case here. It ripped on my first set up and all together seems less strong. Kind of upset with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: My son’s favorite gift- by far!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old son gets off of the video games & plays with this set with his friends at least 5 times per week! His siblings (ages 10-14) also play with it and it is holding up nicely. My 2 year old enjoys playing Spikeball with the big kids, but I’m not certain it would hold up to his toddler ways if he was left unsupervised with it. Besides- that doesn’t seem very safe.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Pelletier Watson

customer_reviews.title: Ball Warped After Two Days of Use
customer_reviews.text: One of our balls warped into an egg-shape on the second day of use. For a product meant for beach play, this seems ridiculous. The company would not replace the ball. Update: Second ball also warped. Junk. Company would not replace balls.
customer_reviews.author: K.R

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the upgraded set. My only negative was the net broke easily the first week I had it. Spike ball is a great company and they sent me a new one right away. I would definitely recommend this game and this upgrade !
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY DAMASCO

customer_reviews.title: Had to go Pro
customer_reviews.text: After owning the standard spike ball set we made the upgrade to the pro series. The more durable net and better ball was noticeable. The construction is about the same so don't land on it going for a dive. Overall we are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Love of the game
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this game. Two boys love it (ages 14 & 16). My husband loves it. I (44 yrs), LOVE IT!!! We even play 1 v 1 games. Instead of the 2 v 2, we altered it for 1 v 1 play if the four of us aren’t together. Instead of the 2 v 2 team getting three hits, our 1 v 1 team can hit it twice. I haven’t been able to play softball for 6 years because I tore my shoulder. This has excited me to get back into an active and strategic sport.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy

customer_reviews.title: CHeck Age Appropriate
customer_reviews.text: There needs to be an age group shown if you are really going to use it the way it is suppose to be played. My granddaughter is 8 and she and her Dad play catch with it. It will help with softball
customer_reviews.author: Susan H. Compton

customer_reviews.title: Net is unraveling
customer_reviews.text: My boys love the set, but after only a couple of uses, the net has started to unravel and will not stay attached to the frame. Is it possible to have a replacement net sent to me?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money for the heavy duty one
customer_reviews.text: Spike ball is just plain old fun. It is so worth getting this heavy duty set. Someone is eventually going to crash into your net, and the cheaper ones break. This one has held up time and time again. Great product
customer_reviews.author: AbqPhil

customer_reviews.title: Zipper pocket broke 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: The added carry bag is very useful, but after the 2nd use, the outside zippered pocket tore open. The game itself is good.
customer_reviews.author: R. Etzler

customer_reviews.title: awesome game - bought the pro kit w/ the upgrade - priceless
customer_reviews.text: easy assembly, pro kit is much better than the standard list - better ball, better frame, more durable ... fI played 3 hours on the beach with my 16 year son and his friends ... priceless!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael DeLaney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this game and bought the pro version so we could have tournaments with several "courts".
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. After playing on the pro set
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. After playing on the pro set, you can't go back to playing on the normal set. The pro set is a lot sturdier, and the pro balls are sooo much better than the the standard. My only complaints would be how difficult it is to get the net attached correctly, and how often the net pops off the hooks.
customer_reviews.author: M. Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Pro is worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. The Pro version is so worth the extra $$. We have both and assuredly Pro is worth it. Fun game. Well designed and well built product.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything good except pump was broken. Too much trouble to send back.
customer_reviews.author: cristy

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Fun
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love this game! It is very well-made and offers hours of fun. We have teens, but it could be played with by any age. It comes with a very sturdy tote to carry it around in. It’s great for backyard play, taking to a sports camp, or playing with at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M.  McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing start....
customer_reviews.text: Just took out of box, and went to inflate ball a little more, and the valve on the pump came off in my hand. :( It is black plastic. It was the first attempt, and off it came. I am quite familiar with its use, just cheaply made. Jury is still out on the rest of the product. Family went out to try it out and they said the ball didn't bounce at all off the net. Just hoping the rest of it is not as poorly made. The net seemed to be a bit flimsy, at $120.00, I had hoped for a bit better quality. Will give it another try...but family was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my grandson.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson’s birthday. He seems to like it. It does take some practice.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: A great fun outdoor game!
customer_reviews.text: Great game. You can get really competitive when playing and you need plenty of space to smack the ball at the net. It took some time to work out the strategy with my partner but it was great fun!
customer_reviews.author: Steven G

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and has everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought the Pro version. The backpack is great and has the ball measuring tool attached so it won’t get lost. Will be easy to carry to a park or beach. Very sturdy and the pump is nice to have included. Fun game to play as a family especially since we are all at home together.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Spikeball = Friendship
customer_reviews.text: Love the set. I'm in college and a leader for a Christian Fellowship. I use Spikeball to initiate conversation with people walking nearby and just bring new people together. It's a wonderful tool for community and friendship. Easy to pick up and play for any gathering! My heart goes out to the creators of the game, as it is my favorite sport. Grace and peace!!
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn A

customer_reviews.title: Great for the BEACH
customer_reviews.text: The package was easy to put together and easy to transport! Comes with carry bag so all pieces stay together
customer_reviews.author: Rob Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Pro set is better than regular set.
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing spikeball for many years now and going from a regular set to a pro set is one of the best things I've ever done! I love this pro set! I would reccomend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! Brought it to the beach and was a big hit with all age groups 14-64
customer_reviews.author: mohsan

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun on vacation on the beach and in the yard. Lots of intense competition as we all figured the game out. Even stood up to several toddlers stepping on it thinking we had gotten them a trampoline!
customer_reviews.author: deemach

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We could never get the net tight without all this extra net hanging on the ground and when taking apart the pieces one of the plastic side rings broke Total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Grandson
customer_reviews.text: This kit was purchased as a Christmas gift for my 12-year-old grandson. I bought the Pro Kit after reading reviews about its durability. My grandson was delighted with the gift, and I know it has been used many times in the past few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: The outer plastic rim broke after only playing it a few times. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: bk

customer_reviews.title: Quality with warantee
customer_reviews.text: It's a fun, fast-paced game for four. With the pro edition we get a lifetime warranty, which did end up coming in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is the one to buy if you are serious. The other ones are just plain “cheesy” and not sturdy, this is legit.
customer_reviews.author: Keelray

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor game
customer_reviews.text: So fun to play with friends, and super reliable. Don't need to worry about breaking the set because with the lifetime warranty if anything breaks or is lost, spike ball replaces it for free. Completely worth the money and would definitely recommend this to anyone who's on the fence. PS: Don't get the standard this set is way better.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Skip the regular and spend the extra for Pro!!!!
customer_reviews.text: With the extra thick rim and stronger legs, plus the advanced ball, inflation pump, ball checker, and backpack, this is definitely worth the extra money over the original version. Go ahead and skip the original all together and jump to the Pro set. Really worth it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H.

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor game
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Definitely worth paying a bit more for the added quality of the ‘tournament’ version. Perfect family/friends game for all ages!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great game for our teenaged son
customer_reviews.text: The guys love this game, heavy duty and easy to assemble and pack
customer_reviews.author: Michelle from So Calif

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Amy daughter suggested that my grandson who just graduated high school and is headed to college might like this, and he does. He loves it. If he is happy, I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi Patrusky

customer_reviews.title: Ball pump defective
customer_reviews.text: The pump for adding air to the balls is defective and does not work. I am not returning the whole set but would like a new and working pump.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S Brockway

customer_reviews.title: Comes as advertised, packaged well.
customer_reviews.text: Comes exactly as described. Contains mesh net, legs, ring segments, a rule book, two balls and pump. It all comes in a convenient and lightweight (read: not super durable) backpack but it was a bonus so I am not complaining. The game itself is fantastic and intense and I would recommend to anyone who enjoys lawn/beach sports with friends. Perfect game to play with a beer in the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: My one complaint is that my friends no longer like me because i am too good and can ruthlessly ...
customer_reviews.text: it was everything that the website said it was, and more. Took my spikeball game to the next level. My one complaint is that my friends no longer like me because i am too good and can ruthlessly end their spikeball careers at will.
customer_reviews.author: momof3

customer_reviews.title: Fun and high quality
customer_reviews.text: A great game to bring along for a tailgate or beach!!!
customer_reviews.author: MILFAllDay

customer_reviews.title: Best dog harness for a large breed.
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by our dogwalker! Great for controlling a 100 lb 1 year old German Shepherd!!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky L.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone enjoyed this game and requested we take it to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this prior to a family vacation on the beach. Everyone enjoyed this game and requested we take it to the beach everyday. It would be nice if there was a subtle circle shaped outline to help guide you evenly put the net on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this - easy to assemble - and can store back in the bag for transporting. Like the Pro Kit b/c it is more durable than the original one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love spike ball but the pro version is not really worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: austin

customer_reviews.title: Take the fun everywhere you go!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son - he loves it. This game is so easy to take and set up everywhere and it's always the one everyone wants to play. Would make an awesome holiday gift.
customer_reviews.author: betsie letterle

customer_reviews.title: Hand pump is the best part!
customer_reviews.text: The pro ball is much better than the regular spike ball. And love having the hand held pump.
customer_reviews.author: pigeon24

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I have ever made. Great times will be had for years to come and spend the extra money for the pro set. You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Sutliff

customer_reviews.title: Spikeball Pro
customer_reviews.text: This game is a Blast!.....Buy the pro model for a few bucks more...FUN!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game! I had the original spikeball I I ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game! I had the original spikeball I I thought THAT was awesome! NOTHING compared to this!! This one is way sturdier..holds its form, it looks cooler, and the balls are textured so they have a lot better grip!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Durable except the net
customer_reviews.text: I really like spike ball and was excited to have the pro series for it durability. When I set up the net I found the net to be falling apart and seems to be smaller than the cheaper spike ball set. The frame is very durable but the net is falling apart right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: David Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great game the balls in the pro sweet make a difference
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Spikeball is the GOAT
customer_reviews.text: Spikeball is one of the only sports playable right now & probably for the next year... Highly recommend buying for the foreseeable future to enjoy with your quarantine/lockdown buddies 🤙🤙
customer_reviews.author: PoppinSmoke556

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Giving it 4 instead of 5 stars because the net broke after my son and his friends played couple long days .. however the company replaced it ASAP with no problems!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It traveled well to Florida for a family vacation and packed up nicely to come home
customer_reviews.text: Quality piece. It traveled well to Florida for a family vacation and packed up nicely to come home. Such a fun game to play on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, but fun
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Just not sure why it was $100. Seems kinda pricey for what probably cost like $10 in plastic to make. Other than the price I love the game!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Kathan

customer_reviews.title: Fun game, cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Fun game but it is a real pain to take down and set up. The net never lines up the way it should and the 2 balls it came with turned into an egg shape within a couple days
customer_reviews.author: kEITH KONKOL

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: Love this game!! Can play for hours without getting bored.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun
customer_reviews.text: The youth at my church really get into this game
customer_reviews.author: joann vanbilliard

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. My son goes out to the field with his friends and the play for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Lovinlife33

customer_reviews.title: Fun game, But not worth the money for how it’s made
customer_reviews.text: Fun game but not worth the money. I had hoped this version would be a bit more heavy duty for the yard. $99 for lightweight plastic, not even worth $50. Wish I had seen it in person first! My fault for not checking what t was made of first!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Clinger

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun Time
customer_reviews.text: Easy to transport, sets up quickly and enjoyed by ALL ages in our family.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sone loves this game and needed to update to pro
customer_reviews.text: The regular version broke after heavy use, but the company is excellent about repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Adler

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Product
customer_reviews.text: We spent close to $100 and now we can't use our Spikeball net. A friend tried taking it apart and one of the pieces broke. What a disappointment. Now the return window is closed. What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: R Sherman

customer_reviews.title: USED WHEN I ORDERED NEW
customer_reviews.text: Absolute joke used for product which I purchased a NEW one. Looks 10 years old, beat up, ripped and not even all the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spikeball
customer_reviews.text: Easy Assemble, nice colors, and durable. Really fun game to play
customer_reviews.author: Mariela

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced by a lot for the Pro set--also, netting ...
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced by a lot for the Pro set--also, netting is flimsy. Our net tore a few times while we were installing it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: My son likes it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He thinks it's great. Not much more to say. Delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: tclemons

customer_reviews.title: So Fun.
customer_reviews.text: Just as the ad described. Perfect for outdoor fun. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bagman

customer_reviews.title: Spike Ball Pro
customer_reviews.text: Much better buy than the regular spike ball game. Comes with pump, 6-foot marker, high vis rails and tournament balls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Balls warped quick
customer_reviews.text: So everything looked great but day two the 2 balls warped really bad. Going to see if they could replace them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frame might be stronger, but net is cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The net was unraveling around the parameter straight out of the box prior to assembly. Contacted Spikeball customer service today 5/28/19. We'll see how this gets resolved. Without a design upgrade, I foresee future nets having the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: William Jude Niebauer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grands live elsewhere and already had one but seemed delighted to have another for summer home.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite S. McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!! Again!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for our teenage daughter. When she opened the box, the net was missing. Now looking through the reviews I can see we we weren’t the only victims.
customer_reviews.author: wilmo

customer_reviews.title: this sport is amazing and this product from Spikeball is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: A very high-quality product ... great sport very cool vibe from the company/community/website... The app to find local players is the best ways to get people together to play a sport that I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Loscavio

customer_reviews.title: Great service and great product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product and this item comes with a lifetime warranty if anything were to break... so far this thing is super sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Will recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! Works just great and when one of the rim pieces broke they sent a replacement at NO COST!
customer_reviews.author: Lynford M.

customer_reviews.title: No tournament registration
customer_reviews.text: Super excited my new new pro setup but did not receive the free tournament entry that was described in the description.
customer_reviews.author: The Young’s

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love the game! It’s everything it said it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Tamie Aragon

customer_reviews.title: Great game. The Pro version is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: We use the Spikeball Pro as a way to mix up the training at our MMA gym. It is great hand eye and agility training and is a great break for the fighters from the usual combination drills and sparring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to put together and very fun to play!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: great fun. Pro kit has replacements available for broken ...
customer_reviews.text: great fun. Pro kit has replacements available for broken parts.
customer_reviews.author: a.pi

customer_reviews.title: Better than the normal set
customer_reviews.text: The frame should be carbon fiber.. stronger for tons of games
customer_reviews.author: Jay F.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra $$
customer_reviews.text: Such a good product. Much better than the standard kit.
customer_reviews.author: Susan F.

customer_reviews.title: Once you understand the mechanics of the game you’ll never put it down
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful game, it’s a great friend making/breaking game and the pro set is worth the extra money for the response and feel of the net. If it broke I’d buy another immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jayton bennett

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: Received my Spikeball Pro today and the pump was missing. It was listed as included and also in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dankert

customer_reviews.title: NO SERVING LINE
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived in brown box, with spikeball pro box inside. Everything is perfect except there is no serving line included...🤷‍♂️😫
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hess

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan of the pro set frame.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of the pro set frame. I had a friend who owned a set and played enough that why limit yourself to relying on someone else bringing a set. Will definitely be using the serving line to get an idea of what serving from regulation distance feels like.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Coulson

product_meta.title: Spikeball Pro Kit (Tournament Edition) - Includes Upgraded Stronger Playing Net, New Balls Designed to Add Spin, Portable Ball Pump Gauge, Backpack - As Seen on Shark Tank TV
feature_bullets: FOUR PLAYER ACTION – Spikeball is a fun, active, and competitive (if you want it to be) 2 on 2 game played with rules kind of like volleyball; Enjoy outdoors, indoors, lawn, yard, beach, gym, tailgate, family get togethers, vacations, virtually anywhere and for any event
33% STRONGER RIMS AND LEGS - Less likely to break from an errant fall or dive. More stable playing surface.
BETTER BALLS - Added texture on the Pro Balls enable more spin and control on hits.
BE LIKE THE PROS - The Spikeball Pro Set is our tournament-standard and used at the National Championship Tournament.
RUBBER FEET - Each leg is sporting two rubber feet to reduce slip when on uneven or smooth surfaces.
